item.description:
Hey guys....I was thinking that we could do something a low key. How about a few drinks after work on a Thursday night. The Met Club is a very hip bar in Chestnut Hill so please dress accordingly. The week of September 24th-30th 50 bars in Boston and around Boston are offering a drink menu with drinks for $4. Hopefully many of you can attend.

Due to the lack of response from the group I am considering cancelling the group all together so lets try and get together and have a good event. Hope to see you all there.....please RSVP yes or no.
item.name: Afterwork Drinks
